climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbonfree Certified determine the carbon footprint of the product, and associated carbon emissions are offset with reduction projects.

features: 【 𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐌𝐚𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐭𝐢𝐜 - 𝐍𝟑𝟑 𝐌𝐚𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐭, 𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐭𝐨 𝐁𝐮𝐢𝐥𝐝 】Our SKBA Magnetic Sticks includes 52 Pcs magnetic sticks and balls,the adopts N27 strong magnet,which is 30% more magnetic than the same type of N30 magnet. It can build more magnetic rods, whether it is a planar or three-dimensional structure. Children can easily connect the magnetic rods together, allowing them to understand and master the mystery of spatial construction in practice.

【 𝐋𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞 𝐬𝐢𝐳𝐞, 𝐬𝐚𝐟𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐝𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 】The magnetic rod adopts a large-sized design, avoiding the danger of children swallowing it. At the same time, the material is sturdy and durable,The connection of the magnetic rod is tight and not easy to loosen, ensuring the safety of children during play. It is made of environmentally friendly materials, and each magnetic rod has undergone strict testing, so there is no need to worry about safety issues for children during use.

【 𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐩𝐥𝐞 𝐰𝐚𝐲𝐬 𝐭𝐨 𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐲, 𝐝𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐧𝐤𝐢𝐧𝐠 】Provides a variety of building gameplay, cultivating children's imagination and creativity, allowing them to freely combine and create various shapes. Children can build larger and more stable structures, fully unleash their creativity, stimulate their creativity and learning interest through piecing and stacking, and bring more fun!

【𝐂𝐨𝐥𝐨𝐫𝐟𝐮𝐥, 𝐆𝐢𝐟𝐭 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐂𝐡𝐢𝐥𝐝𝐫𝐞𝐧】Our magnetic wand uses a variety of bright colors, which can cultivate children's spatial cognition and hand-eye coordination, and improve children's patience and concentration. Attract your child's attention and at the same time be a perfect gift for kids to learn and grow while having fun, a birthday gift for boys and girls over 3 years old.

【𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐜𝐡𝐨𝐨𝐥 𝐈𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧, 𝐒𝐓𝐄𝐌 𝐄𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧】Through the combination and creation of magnetic rods, children can make a variety of shapes and models, and create colorful works through collocation, so that children can learn science, technology, engineering and mathematics knowledge in the game, so as to achieve entertainment and education, stimulate endless creativity, so as to open the door to art, so that children can learn to grow in a happy atmosphere.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 5.0 5.0 out of 5 stars 207 ratings 5.0 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SKBA Magnetic Sticks Our magnetic rods and connectors are not just colorful sticks - they possess a magical energy that brings children's ideas and dreams to life. With high-quality magnetic materials and innovative designs, our magnetic building toys captivate and connect in a mesmerizing way, offering endless creative possibilities. Safety and quality are our utmost priorities. All our magnetic building toys undergo rigorous testing and inspection to ensure they are non-toxic, durable, and compliant with toy safety standards. We offer a variety of sets catering to different age groups and include detailed instruction manuals to help children embark on their creative journey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value added to my daughter toy exercise
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic set of magnetic tiles for toddlers! The variety of shapes and vibrant colors captured my child's attention immediately. The strong magnets make building easy and enjoyable. Durable construction ensures long-lasting play. Highly recommended for fostering creativity and motor skills!.Quality Material: The tiles are well-made with high-quality materials, ensuring they withstand the rough play of a toddler. The magnetic strength is consistent, preventing frustration during building.The set comes with a convenient storage box or bag, helping to keep the play area tidy and making it easy to transport the tiles for playdates or travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong Magnets and very good build quality
reviews.reviewText: My Daughter liked them very much, they are very good. They can be used to create objects of different shapes.The material is sturdy and durable And the magnets are strong and they dont easily fall off.It has box included for storage as well.Over all a very good gift for kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These Magnetic Tiles are like kid-engineered awesomeness! 🚀 Super strong magnets mean epic builds without collapse fears. Eco-friendly and tough – made for rough play. Big size, big fun, and those colors? Pure eye candy! Perfect gift for tons of fun and learning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and entertaining
reviews.reviewText: I got these to bring when I work out at the gym to keep my 2 year old entertained. They are lighter than I thought which makes it easier to carry around, I love that they come contained in their handy little carrying case and the shapes are fun and easy to connect. My daughter will love this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My kid very like this toy
reviews.reviewText: This is a special magnet building block that I have seen. The quantity is not very large. It is easy to organize and convenient. It can be used as an enlightenment toy for children. It is easy for the baby to hold by hand. He likes it very much. He starts playing with it as soon as he unpacks it and can play with it for a long time. Recommended for families with children at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good gift for my kids
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the magnetic building tiles for my kids, and they have been a game-changer! The vibrant colors and strong magnets make building imaginative structures a breeze. The set is durable, providing hours of creative play. My children love the endless possibilities, and I appreciate the educational value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this magnetic toy set for my kids and they really enjoy it. The set comes with tiles in various shapes and sizes, ideal for creating different structures, though their favorite is always a princess castle. The tiles are durable and withstand rough play, a big advantage as my kids often throw them around the house. It is a great toys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my kids favorite
reviews.reviewText: The SKBA 51PCS Magnetic Tiles Building Blocks have become an absolute favorite in our household. The vibrant colors and sensory features engage kids' imaginations, fostering creativity and hours of play. The magnetic design adds an extra layer of fun, allowing for endless possibilities in building and exploration. This set is a fantastic investment in both entertainment and educational value for children.
